molina_memorygame

Class Scores

  • java.lang.Object
    • molina_memorygame.Scores

  • public class Scores
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores a list of sorted score objects for each difficulty level. It fills these lists by reading from text file and appends new scores to the file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scores()

      void addScore(Score score)
      Appends a new score to the text file.
      void fillScores()
      Reads the score file and loads each score into the appropriate list.

      Get easy scores.
      java.util.ArrayList<Score> getHardScores()
      Get hard scores.
      java.util.ArrayList<Score> getMediumScores()
      Get medium scores.
      void resetScores()
      Clears the score file and adds some default values.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string of all the scores.
